LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.slight_delay.label: slight delay
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.slight_delay.descri: I had to delay my plans for leaving this place, but it was for a good reason I think.
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.delay.label: delay
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.delay.description: I dont want to stay around here any longer, hopefully I can leave soon.
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.long_delay.label: long delay
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.long_delay.descript: Why cant I leave? I should have been out of here ages ago!
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.stranded.label: stranded
LanguageData.TravelDelayed.stages.stranded.descriptio: I cant take this anymore, this feels like a prison!
